Kzee African Hair Braiding!
Treat yourself to a new 'do at K Zee African Braiding and Supplies in Dorchester, a high-quality hair salon. Liven up your hair with a number of treatments such as hair cuts done by professional stylists. Score some bouncy and clean locks at K Zee African Braiding and Supplies when you book an appointment today.
Tell Me More

Services

We Specialize in: African Hair Braiding Twisting Cornrows etc Installing Hair Extensions (Sew In Wefts, Glue In etc) Styling We also sell: Hair Extensions, Human Hair (wefts & Bulk), Synthetic (wefts& Bulk), Lace Wigs & Lace Frontals. See Photo Albums For Pictures Call (0016172822575) To Book An Appointment Or Send An Email To (mojiherring@hotmail.com) or Just Drop By The Shop And Take A Look For Yourself 338 Washington Street, Dorchester, Boston, Mass 02121.

Portfolio

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.
Dreads/Locs
Dreadlocs, Sisterlocs, Interlocs, Retwists
Braids
Box braids, Single braids, Twists, Senegalese braids, Cornrows, French braids
Weaves/Hair Extensions/Wigs
Human Hair, Synthetic Hair, Weaves, Wigs, Lace front and Full lace wig installations, Styling and Take downs
Natural Hair
Wash, Blowdry, Twists, Styling, Flat Ironing, Curling
Beauty Supply
We sell Hair and Beauty related products. Hair Extensions, Wigs, Contact lenses, Skincare, Hair care, Makeup,
Miscellaneous Services
We offer other Services such as Photocopying, Printing, Faxing, Key cutting
